name: Conflux Machines #03
description: An abstract piece consisting of one of my Tokyo cityscape photographs duplicated four times and arranged radially in a square. The centerpiece was created by 8 instances of the Content Aware fill function with blend mode set to Lighten, and 2 instances at the topmost layers set to Darken. By Lucius Felimus: https://www.luciusfelimus.com/
